show.title: Restarting Life From Zero
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने Kuku FM (Android)  पर यह शो सुना और मुझे यकीन है कि आपको भी यह जरूर पसंद आएगा। 
https://links.kukufm.com/frP3M4
show.description: Restarting Life From Zero" follows Nikhil, a shrewd businessman betrayed by his greedy wife Sushma and her family, as he loses everything but discovers hope again with Deepika, a selfless young woman who teaches him love and resilience. Amidst Sushma’s schemes, her foolish son Nihal, brother Mitesh, and manipulative mother Bharti, Nikhil fights to rebuild his world from scratch turning betrayal into strength, and revenge into a new beginning. Watch Now!
